summary: The most famous dominatrix in France creates sadomasochist "Ceremonies" in her chateau. Catherine Robbe-Grillet, age 84, defies the relations between power and submission, sensuality and physical pain.
cast: Catherine Robbe-Grillet|Beverly Charpentier|Dominique Corringer|Claude Helleu|Christian Hersant|Alain Robbe-Grillet|Ulriqa Fernqvist|Emma Kim Hagdahl|Daniel Yi Andersson|Carl Olof Berg|Emma-Clara Folin|Piotr Giro|Francoise Fournier|Sandra Haraldsen|Lina Mannheimer
title: La cérémonie
